attributes.action: Establish as legal principle that a victim's informed and considered consent to an "illegal act" is an accepted defense against prosecution for it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently consenting adults who engage in technically "illegal acts" for their mutual pleasure - which includes any form of physical restraint play or discipline play - are BOTH criminalized. The "perpetrator" for performing the "illegal act" and the "victim" for consenting to it, and thus making themselves an accessory to the same crime. It is absurd, when consenting adults enjoy themselves in private, the fact that they ARE consenting has no relevance whatever in law. The consenting nature of the act should, in itself, be established as a legal defense against prosecution.
